articles.title: One in four show low-level exposure to weed killer glyphosate – study - Offaly Live
articles.description: One in four people in Ireland have low-level exposure to the weed killer glyphosate, research has indicated. Scientists at University of Galway investigated levels of background exposure to the herbicide in the first study of its kind in Ireland. The European…

articles.author: Caryn Dolley
articles.title: ORGANISED CRIME: Busted – a global 'super cartel', encrypted message crackdown and cocaine trails to Durban - Daily Maverick
articles.description: In November, police in Europe and other countries took down what they described as a ‘super cartel’ dominating the world’s cocaine trade. It seems the crackdown has a trail that leads all the way to Durban, South Africa’s port city known for mass drug busts.
articles.content:
A powerful international drug cartel said to control a third of Europes cocaine trade was dealt a blow late last year when 49 arrests were carried out in several countries.
